title: Photograph, "Winter Niagara Falls, General View from the American Side", 1856
medium: Glass stereoscopic transparency, black tape, brush and white and gold paint
description: Davidson, G. et al. "Frederic Church Winslow Homer and Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape." New York, Bulfinch Press, Smithsonian Institution, 2006. Figure 27, p. 98.

exhibitions.title: Frederic Church, Winslow Homer & Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, "Winter Niagara Falls, General View from the American Side", 1856.
1856. Glass stereoscopic transparency, black tape, brush and white and gold paint. Gift of Norvin Hewitt Green. 1938-58-53.
